items.sentence: Tom claimed he had nothing to do with Mary\'s murder.
Are you telling me that you can\'t understand French?
Tom and Mary celebrate Christmas together every year.
Tom and Mary claim that they never lie to each other.
Tom and Mary even always wear the same color clothes.
Tom and Mary fell in love and decided to get married.
Tom and Mary got married three months after they met.
I thought Tom would have remembered today\'s meeting.
I suspect that Tom is still in love with his ex-wife.
Tom just announced that he would be moving to Boston.
